hotel name: ibis Gent Centrum St. Baafs Kathedraal
pos review: The location is excellent. The bed was comfortable.

hotel name: ibis Gent Centrum St. Baafs Kathedraal
neg review: A little bit overprices for a very small room, but again, the location is very central!

hotel name: ibis Gent Centrum St. Baafs Kathedraal
pos review: Location (+ good connection to the railway station), quite good breakfast
neg review: No fridge and quite small amount of plugs in the room

hotel name: ibis Gent Centrum St. Baafs Kathedraal
pos review: It is an excellent location in the very heart of Gent. Breakfast is good.

hotel name: ibis Gent Centrum St. Baafs Kathedraal
pos review: Location is good. Staff is nice.
neg review:
I have booked a "superior" room and I ended up in one room looking nothing like the pictures. It was extremely small. If that was the superior I cannot imagine how the standard look like.
I feel I ended up not getting what I paid for!

hotel name: ibis Gent Centrum St. Baafs Kathedraal
pos review: rooms ok for one person. excellent mattress . clean room.
neg review: one towel per person is at least rediculous!!!!
